action.action-desc: Mr. Obernolte introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand certain rehabilitation programs for certain veterans with service-connected disabilities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Streamlining Aviation for Eligible Veterans Act.

section.header: Inclusion of non-degree flight training in certain rehabilitation programs for certain veterans with service-connected disabilities
section.text: Section 3101 of title 38, United States Code, is amended in paragraph (6) by adding at the end the following: A rehabilitation program may include a program that includes flight training and does not lead to a degree.
